Title: Vivre Sa Vie
Writer: Marcel Sacotte (book), Jean-Luc Godard (story), Jean-Luc Godard, Marcel Sacotte (additional narrative)
Actors: Anna Karina, Sady Rebbot, André S. Labarthe, Guylaine Schlumberger
Plot: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.
